verbs.description: [ARG0: Michael Cohen , President Trump 's attorney ,] [V: met] [ARG1: with Russian oligarch Viktor Vekselberg] [ARGM-LOC: at Trump Tower] [ARGM-TMP: just days before the president took the oath of office] . Andrew Intrater arranged the meeting .

Michael Cohen , President Trump 's attorney , met with Russian oligarch Viktor Vekselberg at Trump Tower just days before [ARG0: the president] [V: took] [ARG1: the oath of office] . Andrew Intrater arranged the meeting .
